body:
Support Ruby 3.0.0 official release 🎉

Merry Christmas and Happy Holidays

- Use `evt` instead of `nio4r` as scheduler
- Ruby 3.0 rc1 is required since this version

- Update dependencies
- Fix Websocket Frame Size bug (Thanks to @hyrious for reporting this bug)

- Support reuse port option with `Midori::Configure.socket_reuse_port`
   Clusters could now be easily supported by starting multiple processes in Linux

- Implement `mask_str` method for WebSockets in C
   String messages is now decoded 19% faster than v0.6.0

- Bugs fixed in specs

Enjoy programming with midori and Ruby!

- Introduce `keep-alive` feature
- Introduce new configs `keep_alive`, `keep_alive_timeout`, `keep_alive_requests` for tuning performance
- Using separated thread for ticking timers
- **Substantially increased performance** (About 20% faster on Linux, 2500% faster on macOS)

Enjoy programming with midori and Ruby!

- Fix a serious IOError bug from murasaki. Thanks to @li-thy-um for reporting this issue.

Midori would recover its regular update since this release. The development roadmap would continue as it was.

- Fix WebSocket Connection problem on Firefox 59
- Set minimum target version to Ruby 2.3

- Fix a bug on starting serving before booting up
- Improve unit tests
- Update LICENSE

**🏮 Happy Chinese New Year**

- Generate `Content-Length` in body by default.
- Fix a very serious bug in large response. Thanks to @li-thy-um reporting this serious issue.
- Fix a related bug in unit test.

- Support TCP Fast Open
- Remove EOF prompt. Thanks to @li-thy-um and @tzwm raising the issues.
- Move tutorial to a separated repository

- Improved `Midori::Configure` syntax
- Add `Request#remote_ip` for Real IP
- Add spoofing proof configuration
- Add case-insensitive hash (`HTTPHeader` class)
- The request HTTP Header is now case insensitive

🎄**Merry Christmas and Happy Holidays!**

- Fix dependencies
- Fix mistakes in doc

🎃 **Happy Halloween!**

- Faster WebSocket implementation
- Fix bugs

- Use `query_params` instead of `query_param`
- Set default value of `query_params` to `Hash.new(Array.new)`
- Parse cookie automatically
- Fix bug of parsing body when header is not ready
- Fix dependency bug on `query_param`

- Parse query string automatically
- Fix documentation
- Fix version
- Fix module error

- Improve WebSocket and EventSource performance
- Support Middleware Early Stop
- Separate EventCore to Murasaki Project
- Remove unused dependencies
- Separate Extensions to midori-contrib Project
- Design new Logo
- Better codestyle

- Use new logo
- Fix tutorials
- Add optional response (API incompatible)
- Add midori env
- Add global logger
- Fix redis document

- Improve logger
- Improve time consumption calculation
- Fix redis panic bug

- Fix a serious bug on TCP connection
- Improve network abstraction

- Add example project
- Improve documentation
- Improve EventLoop
- Update dependencies

- Remove timer of event registration process
- Update dependencies
- Update compatibility with ruby 2.4.1
- Improve API doc to 100% covered

- Update dependencies
- Add editor config
- Fix several stability problems
- Fix MySQL connection gets lost on heavy traffic
- Fix PostgreSQL connection gets lost on heavy traffic

- Support Net::HTTP
- Support Net::FTP
- Add Timer
- Improve code

- Add MySQL2 Driver with Sequel
- Test MySQL with every midori release
- Remove useless error handling to improve performance
- Improve spec
- Minor performance improvement for Postgres driver

- Add `Midori::File` Extension
- Add `Sequel` Extension with Postgres Support
- Add `Hiredis` Extension with Redic and Ohm Compatible
- Remove `PromiseException` which was a patch for EventMachine

- Remove extensions temporarily
- Change development schedule
- Add `EventLoop` as Actor Adapter
- Use `nio4r` instead of all `EventMachine` stuffs

- Fix code style
- Fix documentation
- Implement partial tutorial

- Better compatible with ruby 2.4.0
- Improve parser performance
- Fix `LINK` and `UNLINK` methods in JRuby
- Add **LOTS** of new methods defined in RFC

**Merry Christmas! Happy Holidays!**
- Improve code style
- Improve APIs
- Enrich document to 100% covered
- Support ohm (redic)

- Support Redis
- Use `midori` instead of `em-midori` as class name (`em-midori` is now deprecated and would be removed in future versions)
- Merge path
- Bug fixes

- Fix bugs
- Enrich HTTP Code
- Clean up files in gem

- Fix line count
- Print traceback for internal errors by default
- Remove pre_compile in rake task
- Update dependencies
- Fix bug and improve syntax of `helper` method

- Add before API
- Remove example folder

- Improve dependencies of postgres driver
- Improve connection status of postgres driver
- Add Sequel Postgres Support

- Improve syntax of PostgreSQL extension
- Improve error handler inside `Promise`

- Add PostgreSQL driver
- Refactor `Midori::Error` to `Midori::Exception`

- Add File I/O Driver
- Add `DeferPromise` class as syntactic sugar.
- Add `defer {}` as syntactic sugar.

- Track dependency status
- Improve tests
- Fix documentation
- Support `return` inside a block
- Add `Sandbox`
- Add Default capture for 404 and 500 errors

- Reconstruct API match
- Improve performance
- Add `mount` 
- Add APIEngine
- Modify syntax of Runner
- Add `ws` and `es` as alias of WebSocket and EventSource
- Remove `body_accept`
- Improve scopes
- Fix examples
- Fix typo

- Add `Midori::Runner` and `Midori::Configure`
- Fix `Midori::Server.stop` with JRuby
- Improve docs to 100% covered
- Fix JRuby compatibility

- Fix doc error
- Add description to code 451
- Improve performance by tuning EventMachine
- Improve performance by using tmm1/http_parser.rb

- Enrich documentation
- Support helper inside middleware
- Improve performance of helpers
- Use yard for doc instead of rdoc
- Add 451 to header code

- Decrease the size of gem package
- Add helper method
- Add logger instead of puts
- Change `response` to `raw_response` in `CleanRoom`
- Improve performance
- Fix typo

- Improve syntax of middleware
- Improve performance
- Fix typo

- Implement Middleware
- Selectable default output of body through middleware

- Implement EvnetSource
- Fix requiring bug
- Add promise, async and await through meta-programming
- Add fiber to do async process
- Improve examples
- Greatly reduce the size of gem file

- Enrich WebSocket Implementation (Ping, Pong, End Frame)
- 100% test covered
- Fix inner require

- Implement basic WebSocket
- Implement colorful debug log
- Fix examples

- Add Implementation of basic request and response
- Add clean room to run code
- Add API loading
- Add version coding inside gem
- Add error capture
- Fix a serious bug of gem loading
- Fix a bug of route convert

- Improve implementation of API match
- Improve performance of API match
- Clean up code

- Add simple API match implementation

- Add Rubinius and JRuby support
- Remove binary building feature
